entry.title: San Benedetto - Sparkling Mineral Water PET - 24 x 500 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: San Bendetto
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 18.99

San Benedetto - Sparkling Mineral Water PET - 24 x 500 ml

San Benedetto was arguably the original favorite of the Republic of Venice, in vogue with aristocratic Venetian families during the Renaissance. The water, tapped at the surface in ancient times, is now drawn from 1,000 feet below ground to ensure that all its original features are unchanged, and unadulterated; the water trickles to its source from the glaciers of the Dolomites. Without question, San Benedetto is an elite, low-mineral delicacy that carries a 30 milligram per liter punch of Magnesium. The San Benedetto bottle is pretty, and is available in both still and sparkling versions.

  • 0% sodium
  • Subterranean, 100% Italian artisan water
  • Less taste interference, purer water taste
  • Active commitment to the reduction of Co2 emissions
  • Bottled in Italy

entry.title: VOSS - Sparkling Artesian Water Glass Bottle - 24 x 375 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Voss
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 56.99

  • Product Details:
  • Pure artesian water
  • With its iconic design, Voss is served on the tables, in the homes and in the rooms of the most distinctive places worldwide
  • The company is proud of its ongoing commitment to the Voss foundation and maintaining 100% carbon neutrality
  • Voss artesian bottled water is taken from a virgin aquifer that, according to the company, has been shielded for centuries under ice and rock in the untouched wilderness of Central Norway.

entry.title: San Pellegrino - Sparkling Natural Mineral Water PET - 6 x 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: San Pellegrino
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 14.99

San Pellegrino - Sparkling Natural Mineral Water PET - 6 x 1 L

  • Bottle size is the ideal size for sharing with friends
  • Convenient 6-Pack; Great to keep on-hand for everyday dining occasions
  • Imported from Italy & embraces the Italian way of living; its taste is clean and refreshing with medium-size bubbles
  • A refreshing alternative to soda; zero calories, low sodium and no artificial colors or flavors
  • An elegant bottled water for wines and food pairings; perfect for cleansing the palate and amplifying subtle flavors


  • Why Drink SanPellegrino?

  • Known for its signature taste, authentic Italian heritage and sophisticated style
  • The premium sparkling water chosen by food enthusiasts and some of the premier restaurants across the globe
  • Naturally filtered during a 30-year journey through the Italian Alps
  • Sugar-free with zero calories – a refreshing alternative to sugary drinks
  • Pairs deliciously with a wide range of food.

entry.title: Eska - Carbonated Spring Water with Lemon Glass - 12 x 750 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Eska
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 27.99

Eska - Carbonated Natural Spring Water with Lemon - 12 x 750 mlk

Quebec’s very own natural spring water.

Eska Natural and Carbonated spring water is sourced in northern Quebec. It’s naturally land-crafted and filtered by the glacial sediment of the Saint-Mathieu-Lac-Berry esker which gives it its crisp, pure, refreshing taste.

Our non-carbonated, natural spring water bottles are now made of 100% recycled plastic and are 100% recyclable.  Because preserving and protecting the environment is at the heart of who we are.
